name: Alexander
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Americano
metods: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into an old fashioned glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.

name: Angel face
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Aviation
metods: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Between the sheets
metods: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Boulevardier
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Brandy crusta
metods: Mix all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass.  Strain into slim cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

name: Casino
metods: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

name: Clover Club
ingredients: 1 egg white or 20 ml aquafaba or 4 drops cocktail foamer
metods: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

name: Daiquiri
metods: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Dry martini
ingredients: 10 mL (0.34 US fl oz) dry vermouth
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

name: Gin fizz
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

name: Hanky panky
metods: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

name: John Collins
ingredients: 3 cl (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice
metods: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

name: Last word
metods: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Manhattan
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Martinez
metods: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

name: Mary Pickford
metods: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

name: Monkey gland
metods: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Negroni
metods: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Old fashioned
metods: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

name: Paradise
metods: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

name: Planter's punch
metods: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

name: Porto flip
metods: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

name: Ramos fizz
metods: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

name: Rusty nail
metods: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Sazerac
metods: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.[1]

name: Sidecar
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Stinger
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

name: Tuxedo
metods: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

name: Vieux Carré
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Whiskey sour
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: White lady
metods: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

name: Bellini
metods: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

name: Black Russian
metods: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Bloody Mary
metods: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

name: Caipirinha
metods: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

name: Champagne cocktail
metods: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

name: Corpse reviver #2
metods: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.[8]

name: Cosmopolitan
metods: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Cuba libre
metods: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: French 75
ingredients: 15 mL (0.51 US fl oz) lemon juice
15 mL (0.51 US fl oz) simple syrup
metods: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

name: French Connection
metods: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Golden dream
metods: Shake with cracked ice.  Strain into glass and serve.

name: Grasshopper
metods: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hemingway special
metods: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

name: Horse's neck
metods: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

name: Irish coffee
metods: Pour the coffee into a preheated glass, add whiskey and sugar, and stir until dissolved. Pour cream slowly to form a distinct layer.

name: Kir
metods: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

name: Long Island iced tea
metods: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Optionally garnish with lemon slice.[1]

name: Mai Tai
metods: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass.

name: Margarita
metods: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mimosa
metods: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

name: Mint julep
ingredients: 6 cL (2.0 US fl oz) bourbon whiskey
metods: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Mojito
ingredients: 2 teaspoons white cane sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)
metods: Mix mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice

name: Moscow mule
metods: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

name: Piña colada
metods: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve.

name: Pisco sour
ingredients: Several drops of aromatic bitters at the end
metods: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

name: Sea breeze
metods: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Sex on the beach
metods: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Singapore sling
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass.

name: Tequila sunrise
metods: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.

name: Vesper
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Zombie
ingredients: 15 ml Donn’s Mix (2 parts fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part cinnamon syrup)
metods: Mix ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Pour into a tall tumbler glass.

name: Barracuda
metods: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with sparkling wine.

name: Bee's knees
metods: Stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bramble
metods: Stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Canchanchara
metods: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

name: Dark 'n' stormy
metods: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.

name: Espresso martini
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fernandito
metods: Fill a double old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in the Fernet-Branca, fill the glass with cola. Stir gently.

name: French martini
metods: Fill a double old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in the Fernet-Branca, fill the glass with cola. Stir gently.

name: Illegal
metods: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, or "on the rocks" into a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

name: Lemon drop martini
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

name: Naked and famous
metods: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: New York sour
metods: Pour the whiskey, syrup, lemon juice, and egg white into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top. Garnish with lemon or orange zest and cherry.

name: Old Cuban
metods: Pour all ingredients except the wine into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine and garnish with mint sprigs

name: Paloma
metods: Pour the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.

name: Paper plane
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Penicillin
metods: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Lagavulin whisky. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the Lagavulin whisky on top.

name: Russian spring punch
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice and top up with sparkling wine.

name: Southside
metods: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice and top up with sparkling wine.

name: Spicy fifty
metods: metods

name: Spritz
metods: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Suffering bastard
metods: Shake everything but ginger beer with ice, pour unstrained into glass, top with ginger beer.

name: Tipperary
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Tommy's margarita
ingredients: 30 ml Agave syrup (1⁄2 water + 1⁄2 agave nectar)
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.

name: Trinidad sour
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Ve.n.to
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Yellow bird
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

name: B-52
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

name: Bacardi
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

name: Derby
metods: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

name: Dirty martini
ingredients: 10 mL (0.34 US fl oz) dry vermouth
metods: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

name: Godfather
metods: Pour all ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Godmother
metods: Pour all ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
metods: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top.  Garnish and serve.

name: Kamikaze
metods: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

name: Rose
metods: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass.  Garnish and serve.

name: Screwdriver
metods: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

name: Vampiro
ingredients: Few slices fresh red hot chili pepper
metods: Pour ingredients into glass rimmed with salt. Stir.
